QuestData.Title: Blossoming of the Grove
QuestData.Description:
The conservatory grows hearty and hale. Now, it must blossom anew.
Though it requires much in the way of anima, every additional spirit that the conservatory rebirths returns your generosity tenfold.
Confer with Zayhad, so that this conservatory may grow ever larger.
QuestData.LogDescription: Upgrade the Queen's Conservatory to Tier Four
QuestData.RewardText: You have this grove's gratitude. Yet more spirits may now rejoin the cycle.
